titleStmt.title: Selected sentences out of sacred antiquitie, conducing to the establishment of faith and good manners. Gathered by W. Wynne
titleStmt.author: Wynne, William, fl. 1616-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Nathaniell Butter,

notesStmt.note: Includes "Short prayers or meditations vpon the last thinges", pages 67-72, which are presumably by Wynne.
Leaf A1 blank except for signature.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
